title: Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, functions, statistics)
context.additional_context: A course for enhancing job-linked mathematical application skills among in-service professionals, with an active-reflective learning balance considering diverse learning styles

learning_goals: Learners independently solve at least three weekly math problems using video lectures and mobile resources in a flipped learning environment.
Learners submit project-based assessment tasks with a completion rate of 80% or higher under peer feedback and teacher guidance.
Learners derive at least two personalized learning strategies based on VARK (Visual/Auditory/Reading/Kinesthetic) learning style survey results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
